TEXT.S: Cote d'ivoirie Itini i 8 00 N, 5 00 W, noAfilika ko Cote d'ivoire. Polong no sekalay i 322,463 sq km "saka 69 ko rayray no ngangan. " "O sekalay no sera i, 318,003 sq km, no nanom a sekalay i, 4,460 sq km " Polong i 23,740,424 ko tamdaw. sera Masakilac ko sera o malo kakaomahen a sera 64.80 , Malo no kilakilangan a sera 32.70 , malo no roma to a sera 2.50 . siyoto O [[[Yamoussoukro]] ko Siyoto. katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i sakafalo 7 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Alassane Dramane Ouattara, patirengan a romi'ad i 2010 a miheca saka 12 folad saka 4 a romi'ad. Pi'arawan to lakaw CIA List of current heads of state and government
